waltz verb
(WALK)
[ I usually + adv/prep ] informal to walk somewhere quickly and confidently, often in a way that annoys other people: You can't just waltz into my bedroom without knocking - it's private! My idiot husband has gone and waltzed off with my car keys and left me without any way to get to work!
